umbrella_networks.name: Careington International
umbrella_networks.notes: Largest dental umbrella network. Single contract grants access to Cigna, UHC, Anthem, MetLife (limited plans), Humana (via Zelis sub-lease), GEHA/FEDVIP, and 50+ TPAs.
key_exclusions: MetLife standard PDP — only PDP Plus and FEDVIP accessible via Careington
Delta Dental — does not participate in Careington leasing
Aetna — does not access Careington in most markets

umbrella_networks.name: Connection Dental
umbrella_networks.notes: GEHA-owned network. Primary conduit for federal employee dental plans (FEDVIP), Cigna DPPO access in some markets, BCBS/DNOA sub-networks.
key_exclusions: Not used by most commercial payors

umbrella_networks.name: Zelis / Maverest
umbrella_networks.notes: Brand consolidation of multiple legacy networks. NOT an insurance carrier — pure network leasing + repricing. Primary conduit for Humana dental leasing.
key_exclusions: Not a direct contracting entity — always a sub-lease
Repricing engine only; payor still appears on EOB as primary

umbrella_networks.name: DenteMax
umbrella_networks.notes: 75M+ members. Primary leasing network for mid-market and voluntary benefit payors: Beam, Colonial Life, Mutual of Omaha, Renaissance, Starmount, TruAssure, Unum, AlwaysCare.
key_exclusions: Does not lease to Big 5 payors (Cigna, UHC, Aetna, MetLife, Delta)
Primarily used by voluntary/supplemental benefit carriers

umbrella_networks.name: DNOA (Dental Network of America)
umbrella_networks.notes: Represents BCBS plans in states where BCBS does not operate own dental network: TX, IL, NM, Kansas City, OK, MT. Also Dearborn National.
key_exclusions: Geographic restriction — only active in specific BCBS states
Not used outside HCSC-affiliated BCBS plans

umbrella_networks.name: Premier Dental Network (PDG)
umbrella_networks.notes: Smaller umbrella. State-specific availability. Less common than Careington/Zelis/DenteMax.
